name: Impulse Blue Theme - Pokemon Showdown
description: This time i am preseting Impulse Blue aka Roleplay Blue! this is the 2nd theme in the Impulse Theme Series!. Roleplay blue is specially created for the Roleplay Server but you can use it on your server as long as you use it under the License. If you have any suggestions, questions, bug reports or criticism, feel free to let me know here or on showdown! You can find me on Wisp & Roleplay server under Prince Sky name.
additional_info: Features: ● Custom fonts! ( georgia, times, times new roman & serif ) ● Beautiful color combination! ( dark blue, blue & white ) ● Custom animated weather backdrops! ● Custom ORAS battle backdrops! ● Unique information box!
